datacenter.persistent
Class Persistent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--datacenter.persistent.Persistent
Direct Known Subclasses:
Channel, Computation, Container, Level
public abstract class Persistent
extends java.lang.Object

Common base class for all persistent objects.
A call to PSynchronise() takes care of either performing a INSERT INTO if the object is new, or a UPDATE ... VALUES(...) if the object already exists.
